column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This time my baby shower was hosted here in a private room that accommodated my 50 person party! I cannot express how friendly and accommodating the wait staff was
column3: they provided! The food and drinks were brought out in a timely manor! This is a wonderful location for a private party
column5: make any changes to the room that you need and help you set up and clean up the room so fast!!
